otherNames: Necromancer the Ultimate Scourge!, Catastrophic Necromancer, Disastrous Necromancer, Necromancer! I am a Natural Disaster, Necromancer: King of the Scourge, Necromancer: Rei dos Mortos, Scourge Necromancer, Si Ling Fashi! Wo Ji Shi Tianzai, ¡Nigromante La
synopsis: In a world where magic and monsters exist, Lin Moyu has hit the age of acquiring his very own profession. While most would be lucky just to obtain a high-level combat class, Moyu becomes the ultrarare necromancer! Being the first and only one of his kind, he has no idea of the potential he possesses on his journey to level up and face great challenges. What new heights will Moyu achieve with his unique army of undead?
